name: Cirno's Math Class
description:
Are you smarter than a Cirno?

Cirno's Math Class is a tiny STG I made for 2022's Cirno Day (9/9).

According to my testing, the web build only works on Chrome. If you use a different browser, please download an executable instead.

BGM by Clement Panchout (Life is full of Joy)
SFX from touhou-sfx by brogrammist

This is derivative fanwork of Touhou Project, not affiliated with Team Shanghai Alice.
